originalText: kirill_postMutieHuntersBattle
Start Element
juraj

Dannath, Jaxon, Madelyn, Craig, Pryce, Ven and Lars have all given their lives for us to have this chance - a chance to go to the promised land. ::The grip of his gun rattles, as he squeezes it.:: Our final destination. And we shall not waste it. For without them... ::wheeze:: none of this would've been possible. ::He exhales loudly as he releases the tension on his gun.::

Don't stretch yourself, Juraj. They knew what... ::wheeze:: they've signed up for. ::He pats Juraj on the back.:: The biggest rewards... ::wheeze:: are only for those fit to go all the way. Let the dead weight sink to the bottom. They've got... ::wheeze:: what was coming to them either way.
I didn't even know most of their names... but I can see... ::wheeze:: how they'd mean so much to you. My... my condolences. ::She offers Juraj a handshake.::

Don't swat it, Juraj. We've been in this biz... ::wheeze:: for far too long for you to do any of that. On our lil' race to the bottom ::He giggles::, Kharon didn't make it after all. And that's what matters. Now, eyes... ::wheeze:: on the prize.

::Slowly, taking each step with care, he boards the boat. Suddenly, he fiercely yanks the doors of the ship's back compartment. With great haste he empties the space, throwing out some boxes. Winded from the effort it took, he rests for a short moment.:: Come. ::He points you to go inside.:: you'll have to stay in here for the ::wheeze:: journey. On our way there, we cannot... ::wheeze:: afford to be spotted carrying things that would unintentionally... ::wheeze:: draw unnecessary attention, and perhaps something much worse than that. ::He gestures you to come, as he starts to man the ships control systems.::
Didn't you have enough already? That place is our refuge, not some sort of dumpster for you to plunder. Chill out, man! ::She shakes nervously.::

Now the two of us... I suppose I couldn't... ::wheeze:: ask for much more than that. We... we should ::wheeze:: take the boat. The refuge's location must be on it... ::wheeze:: somewhere. If the rumors are true, where we are heading... ::wheeze:: we won't need any additional tools on us. ::She closely looks at the boat, before looking back at you.:: I still can't believe it... Where we are heading... ::wheeze:: only words of praise could be heard. Out there ::wheeze:: we'll finally be able to... rest from all of... this. ::She slowly boards the ship. After inspecting the ship, she turns towards you.:: There's only one way to truly find out. ::Her hand reaches out to you, as she invites you to set sail..::

Anyways, there's not much... ::wheeze:: use out of us sitting here. Who can tell... ::wheeze:: if Kharon has someone who's looking for his twisted spine. Let's get going. ::He skips onto the boat.:: Lil' boaty, take us to the booty. ::He laughs to himself, as he inspects the ships controls. After a little while, he waves at you to come over. In doing so, he opens up the back compartment of the ship and points you to go inside.:: You'll be in here. Kharon... ::wheeze:: used to put in here all of his "volatile" stuff. We don't want to get disturbed... ::wheeze:: on our way to our... "promised land". ::He smiles and once again gestures you to board the ship.::
context.npc_xpbl_juraj_dead

Chill out. ::Wheeze:: Why would you double down on them? We don't need any more... ::wheeze:: tension here, okay? ::She raises her voice.:: Let's take this boat, and get the hell out of here. I'm sick and tired of this place... and everything... ::wheeze:: we've been through to get here.

Thanks. ::He accepts the handshake.:: We were a gang... ::wheeze:: a tough one at that. Worked for Kharon, almost from... ::wheeze:: the get-go. We kept it all together, despite the mess we've been through. Only now... ::wheeze:: I can see how it truly feels like, when you lose so much... so fast. And we did the same... ::wheeze:: to so many... for some petty coins and painkillers. How ironic. And how could I even forget... ::wheeze:: the day we've became all this. Has it been that long? ::He covers his face.:: I... I resent the being that I was, now, with every bit of strength I have left. I-I'm glad we've ended it all. Now, let's get onto the boat. It'll take... ::wheeze:: us to our refuge.

Your filthy mouth... ::wheeze:: speaks some truth today. ::Gritz makes a wide grin on his face.:: Come to think of it. all gigs were... ::wheeze:: about us all along. ::He nods to himself as he scratches his nose.:: Our gang is now all but gone, and we've made it to the finish line - hopefully. ::Both of them slowly board the ship. Juraj heads for the sailing systems and starts to slowly inspect it. Soon after, he goes to the back of the ship's container section. Together with Gritz, they manage to open the gates and eventually, they make enough room inside it. Their attention goes back to you.::
English
::Board the ship and set sail.::

Yeah, yeah sure; resting place, blah, blah, blaaah. ::He waves with his hands.:: The way I see things, you cannot get disappointed if you have no expectations. Keep them low, and it'll make the entire journey... ::wheeze:: more fun once you get to the loot, you get me?

We shall - we *must*... never forget... or undermine... ::wheeze:: the work they've done. But you're both right. This is not the first time... ::wheeze:: we had similar downfalls. Hopefully, this'll be the last. ::His gun points at the boat.:: Move up, board the ship. I can see it from up here... ::wheeze:: that it has some guidance systems. That has to be it. ::One by one they board the ship, cautiously taking each step on the way there.::
English

Watch your step in here. There could always be some... ::wheeze:: more trouble in here. ::He points at you, slowly.:: We'll have to put you in the back container... ::wheeze:: it has plenty of space. ::He glances over at Senna as she gives him sign of approval.:: Don't worry, this is how Kharon used to ferry more... difficult matter... ::wheeze:: to his desired destinations. Come. ::He gestures you to board the ship.:: Refuge awaits.

Come now, friend. We're leaving... ::wheeze:: this place. We've got all we need to get to the refuge. You'll have to stay inside here. ::He points to the compartment.:: That way, we won't attract... ::wheeze:: any potentially harmful eyes on us. After we've been through... ::wheeze:: we can't afford any more trouble.
Xpbl_PlayerMutantSailsForBlackSea
Whatever, I don't care. Let's just... ::wheeze:: get the hell out of here. The boat better be having something... ::wheeze:: on it to lead us there. Otherwise I should've stayed back in the sewers.
Finally, our sweet lil' reward is here. ::He laughs to himself, as he rubs his palms in joy.::

::Both of them step up onto the boat. Gritz swiftly opens the doors to the ship's back container. After that, he turns towards you and gestures you to walk inside.:: Over here, umm... friend? Where we are heading, we'll most likely need you. ::He smiles.::

The space in here is tight. ::He points at you.:: We'll have to put you... in the ship's cargo ::He looks at the large metal doors of the back of the ferry.:: We'll clean it up... ::wheeze:: and then... we set sail.
::Senna glances over at Gritz, nervously.:: We've all earned our fair share. ::She looks down on him. After that, she also gestures you to walk over.:: It'll be okay. You can trust me.
